subScenes.name: 打招呼询问
subScenes.description: 进店问候并说明需要购买电钻

qaPairs.speakerText: Hey there! How's it going? Can I help you find something today?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！最近怎么样？今天需要帮忙找什么吗？

responses.text: Hi! I'm looking for a cordless drill, any recommendations?
responses.text_cn: 嗨！我在找一把无绳电钻，有推荐的吗？

responses.text: Yeah, I need a power drill — got any in stock?
responses.text_cn: 对，我需要个电钻，有货吗？

responses.text: Hello. I want to buy an electric drill.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用口语缩写更自然，别太正式

qaPairs.speakerText: Sure thing! We've got a few models — are you DIYing or doing professional work?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 当然！我们有几款，你是自己用还是专业施工？

responses.text: Just for home projects — fixing shelves and stuff.
responses.text_cn: 就家里用，修修架子之类的。

responses.text: I'm a contractor, so I need something durable.
responses.text_cn: 我是承包商，需要结实耐用的。

responses.text: Home use.

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据用途选词，别笼统说‘用’

subScenes.name: 询问功能
subScenes.description: 询问电池续航和功率等关键参数

qaPairs.speakerText: This one’s got a 20V battery — lasts about 90 mins on a charge.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这款是20伏电池，充一次能用90分钟。

responses.text: Cool! Does it come with two batteries? I hate waiting to recharge.
responses.text_cn: 不错！配两个电池吗？我不想等充电。

responses.text: How long’s the runtime? I'm drilling a lot of holes.
responses.text_cn: 续航多久？我要打很多孔。

responses.text: 90 minutes? Okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体需求提问，如‘打多少孔’

qaPairs.speakerText: It also has a 2-speed setting and a built-in LED light.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 它还有两档调速和内置LED灯。

responses.text: Perfect! The LED’s a game-changer for dark corners.
responses.text_cn: 太棒了！LED灯对暗角太有用了。

responses.text: Nice, but do I really need two speeds?
responses.text_cn: 不错，但我真需要两档吗？

responses.text: LED? Cool.

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达偏好时用‘game-changer’等生动词

subScenes.name: 确认库存与价格
subScenes.description: 确认是否有货并询问能否打折

qaPairs.speakerText: We’ve got one left in stock — it’s $129.

responses.text: Can you knock off $10? I’ll take it right now.
responses.text_cn: 能便宜10块吗？我现在就买。

responses.text: Is that the best price? I saw it online for less.
responses.text_cn: 这是最低价了吗？网上卖得更便宜。

responses.text: Okay, I'll take it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提价时带理由，如‘马上买’更易成功

qaPairs.speakerText: I can do $119 if you grab it today — no warranty extension though.

responses.text: Deal! I’ll take it. What’s the warranty?
Hmm... can you throw in extra batteries?
No thanks.

qaPairs.usageNote: 接受折扣时立即确认，避免犹豫

qaPairs.speakerText: Standard warranty is 2 years — covers motor and battery defects.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 标准保修两年，涵盖电机和电池故障。

responses.text: What if I drop it and crack the housing? Covered?
So no accidental damage? Got it.
responses.text_cn: 那意外损坏不算？明白了。

responses.text: Two years? Good.

qaPairs.usageNote: 追问意外情况，避免售后纠纷

qaPairs.speakerText: Nope — only manufacturer defects. You can buy extended warranty for $15.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 不包，只包出厂缺陷。加15美元可延保。

responses.text: Nah, I'm good. I'll just be careful.
Wait — can I pay with card for the extension?
Okay, I'll skip it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 拒绝时加理由，显得更自然

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I'll ring you up. Cash or card?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好的，我给你结账。现金还是刷卡？

responses.text: Card, please. Thanks so much for your help!
Cash. You saved me some cash!
Card.

qaPairs.usageNote: 道谢能提升服务体验，别只说付款方式

qaPairs.speakerText: Here's your receipt and the drill. Have a great day!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是收据和电钻，祝你今天愉快！

responses.text: Thanks! You're awesome. See you next time!
Appreciate it. Later!
Okay, bye.

qaPairs.usageNote: 告别语带情绪更显真诚，别只说‘拜’
